This_option_is_used_to_prioritize_order_: This option is used to prioritize order allocation or order fulfillment into one location. If you select Yes and there is not enough stock in one location, there will be an allocation not found error status.
If_on_Prio_One_Store_selected_Yes_choose: If on Prio One Store selected Yes, choose No in this field to keep prioritizing order allocation in one location. Or choose Yes if you want to split order allocation into different locations to meet the required stock.

\"One_Store_Priority_Only\"_means_alloca: "One Store Priority Only" means allocate to one store only, if not available mark order as Failed - Allocation not found.
\"Split_Shipment_if_One_Store_Not_Availa: "Split Shipment if One Store Not Available" means allocate to one store that can fulfill all items. if not available, allocate to more than one store.
\"Split_Shipment\"_means_order_can_be_al: "Split Shipment" means order can be allocate to more than one store.

Priority_level_used_for_priority_locatio: Priority level used for priority location in order shipping.
Quantity_Stock_that_will_not_be_sold_for: (Quantity) Stock that will not be sold for this location. The default qty is 0.
Choose_Yes_if_this_location_has_access_t: Choose Yes if this location has access to manage stock. The default option is No.
Choose_Yes_to_enable_autocomplete_mode_i: Choose Yes to enable auto-complete mode in order shipping. The default option is No.

Each_bundle_product_entry_has_the_struct: Each bundle product entry has the structure of a parent product, option (as a variant of the bundle), and child products. Type_of_product_data_parent_option_or_ch: Type of product data (parent, option, or child).
SKU_of_the_bundle_product_All_product_da: SKU of the bundle product. All product data in the same bundle should use the same SKU.

to_enable_the_bundle_product_in_the_cata: to enable the bundle product in the catalog or select

bundle_product_price_This_value_is_only_: bundle product price. This value is only required for the parent product.
to_specify_the_entry_not_as_a_fixed_bund: to specify the entry not as a fixed bundle product.

if_the_weight_of_the_bundle_product_foll: if the weight of the bundle product follows the original weight in the product catalog. Set the value to
if_the_product_weight_follows_the_value_: if the product weight follows the value set here. This value is only required for the parent product.
Default_variant_option_title_All_child_p: Default variant option title. All child products for the default variant option must have the same title.
Set_the_position_of_option_and_child_pro: Set the position of option and child product in the bundle product variant option. For parent products, just leave this column blank.

Likewise, if you want to import more than one fixed bundle product, the following entries must be arranged according to the structure that is mentioned earlier.
SKU_of_the_fixed_bundle_product_All_prod: SKU of the fixed bundle product. All product data in the same bundle should use the same SKU.

Full_name_of_the_fixed_bundle_product_Th: Full name of the fixed bundle product. This value is only required for the parent product.

pull_product_desc: Send data to Sales Channels. If the SKU has been registered in the Sales Channel the data in the Sales Channel will be replaced by data from OMS.
push_product_desc: Download data from Sales Channels. If the SKU has been registered with OMS the data in OMS will be replaced by data from the Sales Channel. Products that do not have an SKU in the Sales Channel will not be pulled into OMS
push_product_data_desc: Uploading data to sales channels takes time. depending on the number of products and marketplace selected. If there is a failure when uploading your product you can look at the Sync Failed section for more details

product_active_display: If the product status is active your product will appear in the store.
add_tags_keyword: Add keyword tags so that users can easily search for products
product_release_schedule_desc: Product start time & date displayed on the webstore. Products cannot be purchased by customers before the opening date & time of the sale.

product_cross_sell_desc: Display product offers from different categories on the webstore checkout page.
product_up_sell_desc: Tampilkan tawaran produk dari kategori sama yang harganya lebih tinggi pada halaman detail produk webstore.
improve_the_position: improve the position of the webstore or product page on the list of search engine results.

section_info_delete_product: Make sure the product has been deleted from the marketplace seller center before deleting the product on this platform. If the product has not been deleted from the marketplace seller center, the product will reappear on this platform during the product withdrawal process.
section_info_pull_product: Products that can be withdrawn from the Marketplace Channel are products that have SKU value in the seller center
section_info_push_product: If the SKU has been registered in the Marketplace Channel, the data in the Marketplace Channel will be replaced by data from OMS.
section_info_warehouse: The choice of warehouse will influence the allocation of orders in this marketplace channel.

Active = stock in all marketplace channels will be the same as warehouse stock.

section_info_integrate_tokped2: Done with the help of the SIRCLO Store Support Team
Need_access: Access is required for integration. Don't have access yet?
sync_alert_1: This feature is one-way from Swift to Marketplace
sync_alert_2: so make sure your stock is correct before activating this feature
main_photo_description: Drag the photo to first so that it becomes the main product photo
Download_template_stock_excel2: You need to select the store first.
upload_product_info: Only simple products are supported (product variants are not yet supported).
Are_you_sure_enable: Are you sure you have updated stock in Swift?
All_stock_will_be_sync: All stock in swift will be synchronized to the Marketplace Channel.
if_there_has_previously_been_a_stock: If there has previously been a stock value in the relevant Marketplace, make sure the stock value for the product on all of these stock list pages is in accordance with your wishes. The synchronization action cannot be returned to the starting point before the synchronization was carried out.
drag_pin_point_to_set_location: Drag pin point to set location
Set_product_sku: Set product SKU in Marketplace Seller Center
disable_registration_message:
New seller registration is currently closed.
You will be redirected back to the login page in 5 seconds.
Thank you.
chat_integration_is_directly: Tokopedia chat integration is directly connected when you integrate Tokopedia in the marketplace section
agent_management: Agent management for each conversation channel
chat_management: Chat management of various marketplaces without switching tabs
display_product_status: Display product status & customer orders in chat
commerce_title: Turn Conversations into Transactions with Marketplace Chat
commerce_info_chat: Reply to chats is easier and more practical without having to open and close many tabs
commerce_info_account: Can be multi-account, manage multiple Marketplaces
commerce_info_performance: Monitor the performance of agents/admins in responding to customer chats
Image_width_must_be_less_than_width: Image width must be less than {{width}}
Image_height_must_be_less_than_height: Image height must be less than {{height}}
pull_product_message: Pulling products takes time based on the number of products and the number of connected marketplaces
pull_product_message2: The order in which products are pulled per Marketplace influences the formation of the Master Product first.
push_modal_message: Please double check your product data and make sure it is correct. Existing data will be sent to the Marketplace after you click the submit button.
To_be_able_to_connect_to_the_marketplace: To be able to connect to the marketplace chat service. Make sure your account is connected to the marketplace.
You_must_be_connected_to_the_marketplace: You must be connected to the marketplace whose chat service you want to use.
Never_been_synced_to_the_marketplace_Sav: Never been synced to the marketplace. Save to sync into Marketplace
Product_on_Tokopedia_cannot_be_updated_i: Product on Tokopedia cannot be updated if the product already has a transaction
